extension.news:
[B]1.7.8[/B] - Addon is working on Kodi 20.1, Kodi 21.2 - tested. - All In One version for directone HU, Skylink SK, Skylink CZ providers. You need to select your provider In configuration Account tab -> Provicer. Defaut is Hungary. - You can set a Device name in addon configuration Account tab-> Device Friendly Name. Default is CHROME but can be changed so you can manaage devices easier if you have more. - EPG fix - Channel Logos are downloaded to the location where the channel list location is set. Addon creates a folder "Channel_logos", you will find the logo pcitures there. Set that folder in SimpleIPTV addon config and after Kodi restart you will have logos. - Fix in service part to catch first start config/change config better. - Opening the Addon itself instead of Simple IPTV Addon "Live TV" and Archice(Catchup) are working ! Library still Out of order! - Bugfixes [B]1.7.7[/B] - API changed from OAUTH to SSO. Now SSO session is saved. - Multithreaded full EPG download with programmes description takes around 8 minutes on a chromecast. (different way to get as old method) at first run or on settings changed there is a progress bar on top of screen to show EPG download progress. - The live Channels are working and catchup for supported channels via Simple IPTV client. Catchuo from simple iptv EPG page - PIN code related things are not supported yet. - If maximum registered devices reached(10) popup window will show during device registration so you can select which device to delete. Old plugin deleted oldest device. [B]1.7.6[/B] - api link change [B]1.7.5[/B] - Omega compatibility [B]1.7.3 Direct One HU[/B] - Nexus compatibility [B]1.7.2 Direct One HU[/B] - Direct one modifications [B]1.7.1[/B] - generating epg into the past for catchup, default 0 - Matrix skin blocking - enable skipping for the first three minutes when using "play from here" in the classic archive, default true - categories in the library [B]1.7.0[/B] - support for Kodi 19, including catchup, thanks to panda7789 [B]1.6.7[/B] - category generation fix in EPG - fix url on session previews [B]1.6.6 UPC Direct HU[/B] - Identical with 1.6.6 but modified to UPC Direct Live TV (HU) instead of Skylink (CZ/SK) - Slovakian and czech localization removed, hungarian added -
